mapper.select: select * from alarm where alarm_id = #{id} and alarm_readdate is null order by alarm_regdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (alarm_seq, alarm_index_no, alarm_contnum, alarm_id, alarm_reg_id, alarm_regdate) VALUES (alarm_seq.nextval, #{alarm_index_no}, #{alarm_contnum}, #{alarm_id} , (select member_id from member where member_number = #{alarm_reg_id}), sysdate)
mapper.update: update alarm set alarm_readdate = sysdate where alarm_seq = #{alarm_seq}
